nodes.text: The Nanth'ri Trade Route, also referred to simply as the Nanth'ri Route, was a trade route in the Expansion Region of the galaxy that was smaller than the Hydian Way. After leaving Denon for Omereth, the Desert Jewel was to jump Coreward along the Hydian Way to Exodeen and from there they were to take the Nanth'ri Trade Route that eventually would offer several different ways to reach Omereth.
